TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AudienceQueryControl extends Microsoft.SharePoint.WebControls.SimpleQueryControl

Docs.summary: Provides a control to search global audiences, distribution lists, and SharePoint groups by audience name. This control works with the control.

Docs.param: The object that represents a row of audience data from which the object is populated.
Docs.summary: Populates a object with the audience information from the provided query results data row.
Docs.returns: The object that contains the audience information.

remarks.para: The object returned by this override includes the audience display name, description, type, email nickname, and member count.

Docs.param: The object that represents the audience name for which to search.
The object that represents the name of the type of audience to search.
The object that represents the page index number of the query results to return.
The object that represents the number of the query result items to return.
Docs.summary: Uses the specified search string to query for an audience by name and returns paged results.
Docs.returns: The object that represents the count of the items returned by the query.

remarks.para: This override uses the specified search string to perform a paged query for an audience by name. It then sets the Results property of the parent control with the results of the query.

Docs.param: The object that contains the event data.

remarks.para: This override stores the specified audience group name and adds it to the collection.

Docs.param: The object that contains the event class.

remarks.para: If the page where the control is on is being loaded for the first time (that is, the is false), then this override executes the query to get the audience information according to the current audience group name.
